meanings.definition: Capable of being divided or shared
meanings.sent1: The cake was partible, so everyone could have a slice.
meanings.sent2: The toy was partible, allowing siblings to play with different parts.
meanings.sent3: The pizza was so partible that even the smallest slice was enough for a meal.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was partible, spreading joy to all who knew her.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map led to a partible chest filled with gold coins.

meanings.sent1: The puzzle was partible, making it easy for children to solve.
meanings.sent2: The necklace was partible, with each bead detachable.
meanings.sent3: The sandwich was partible, with each layer representing a different flavor.
meanings.sent4: His attention was partible, shifting from one task to another.
meanings.sent5: The clouds were partible, floating across the sky in distinct shapes.

meanings.definition: Able to be distributed or apportioned
meanings.sent1: The resources were partible among the team members for the project.
meanings.sent2: The responsibilities were partible, ensuring everyone had a role to play.
meanings.sent3: The music was partible, reaching every corner of the room.
meanings.sent4: Her time was partible, balancing work, family, and hobbies.
meanings.sent5: The love in her heart was partible, touching all those around her.
